text: Van-royena is a genus of the plant family Sapotaceae described as a genus in 1963.Aubréville, André. 1963. Adansonia: recueil périodique d'observations botanique, n.s. 3: 329Tropicos, Van-royena Aubrév. There is only one known species, Van-royena castanosperma, endemic to the Cook region in northern Queensland.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ==References== Category:Chrysophylloideae Category:Endemic flora of Australia Category:Monotypic Ericales genera Category:Sapotaceae genera
title: Van-royena
